title: Polo Men's Long Sleeve Classic Oxford Shirt
description: The cotton oxford shirt made its debut at the beginning of the Gentleman Collection, and since then it has solidified its status as a pillar of the Polo look. Today, we continues to design countless variations of iconic shirt, including this Big & Tall version that is finished with our multicolored signature Pony.
Size Tall 2L has a 36" back body length, a 22.5" shoulder, a 62.25" chest, and a 39" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Button-down point collar. Buttoned placket.Long sleeves with buttoned barrel cuffs.
Split back yoke with a box pleat ensures a comfortable fit and a greater range of motion.

Exquisite Multicolored Embroidered Pony Accents Chest: The logo design is Multicolored and classic，wearing our polo shirt will let you remain timeless and elegant. The shirt represents a way of life, tied to luxury, elegance, and refinement.
